special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.hyperlinked: At will: animal friendship (snakes only)
3/day each: poison spray, suggestion

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
